attributes.action: mandate that all MPs who have gained pecuniary advantage by changing their Main and secondary homes, must repay any expenses/allowances claimed from Public funds, personally pay Capital gains tax on any profit made on resales of such property and resign from their post.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
